reference.title: Migrating to release 2.1
reference.shortdesc: In DITA-OT 2.1, the insertVariable template was deprecated for PDF transformations and should be replaced with the getVariable template. Various dita.out.map.* targets have been deprecated in favor of updated dita.map.* equivalents. There are likely other changes that should be noted here. See .
